name: Cross Word ACE
description:
Are you master of words? This's a brand new challenge waiting for you. Cross Word ACE is a free word game. Connecting letters become the correct words. 1000+ levels to challenge. Come to prove your skills !

Cross Word ACE is a new word game. Combine alphabet sorting and crossword style games. It's time to discover all the hidden words and enjoy the fun and excitement of building words ! Levels will get harder and harder. How many levels can you challenge?

Rules:
*Connect the letters in the correct order to form a word.
*Fill in the blanks with the correct words. Find all the words.

Characteristic:
*The game mode is easy and fun.
*More than 1000 levels and more hidden words.
*Facebook Game：Log in with Facebook. Race online with friends!
*No time limits, no pressure.
*Beautiful visual design for a better experience.

Play Cross Word ACE in your free time and exercise your brain while enjoying leisure time.
